summary.para: Contains classes and interfaces that allow you to configure your WinForms application in the fluent API-based application builder.
Stores handlers for EF Core Middle Tier Security events.

summary.para: Extends the interface with methods to configure EF Core Middle Tier Security.
Enables and configures EF Core Middle Tier Security.

member.param: Allows you to enable and configure the Security System in your application, and chain further configuration.
Options that allow you to configure the Security System.
Options that allow you to configure the Security Module.
member.returns: Allows you to enable and configure the Security System in your application, and chain further configuration.

summary.para: Contains options that you can use to configure EF Core Middle Tier Security.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Win.ApplicationBuilder.EFCoreMiddleTierSecurityOptions.BaseAddress

summary.para: Specifies the Middle Tier Security server address.

member.value: The Middle Tier Security server address.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Win.ApplicationBuilder.EFCoreMiddleTierSecurityOptions.Events

summary.para: Provides access to EF Core Middle Tier Security events.

member.value: EF Core Middle Tier Security events.

summary.para: Delays the start of the XAF Windows Forms application until the Middle Tier Server is ready to receive and handle client requests.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Win.ApplicationBuilder.EFCoreMiddleTierSecurityOptions.WaitForMiddleTierServerReady(System.TimeSpan)

summary.para: Delays the start of the XAF Windows Forms application for a specified period or until the Middle Tier Server is ready to receive and handle client requests.

member.param: A object that specifies the maximum delay duration. When the time runs out, the application starts whether the Middle Tier Server is ready.

summary.para: The fluent API-based builder that allows you to configure EF Core Middle Tier Security in your WinForms application.
